reviewText:
I've seen a lot of faux videos, and this one has them all beat, hands down.  I knew exactly the style I wanted, but couldn't find instructions anywhere.  I didn't even know the name of the technique.  I even took a class at a local paint store, and the instructor didn't show the technique.

Turns out what I wanted was "glazing" - which you often see in restaurants, etc., and makes the walls look Mediterranean and old.  It is very subtle, and it was exactly what I wanted.  She is very good at explaining everything.  Buy this video, you won't be disappointed!
